channel.title: Dan Plays Black Mesa
channel.description:
Having looked forward to it ever since it was announced years ago, [url='https://www.robanddan.tv']The Rob and Dan Show[/url] has been eager to see what the Black Mesa team would put out. [url='https://www.twitter.com/Leto']Dan[/url] was so happy with the product that he decided to do a full playthrough of the epic re-imagining of Half Life over on [url='https://www.youtube.com/TheRobandDanShow']The Rob and Dan Show YouTube[/url]!
Make sure to watch every video (New video every Tues/Thurs!) over at our [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MXMldegQVfM&list=PL37vNmiqebYiHVM3U8iEkyo5yNMfWrnax&index=1&feature=plpp_video']Black Mesa Playlist![/url]

item.title: Dan Plays Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: The_Rob_and_Dan_Show
item.description:
Having looked forward to it ever since it was announced years ago, The Rob and Dan Show has been eager to see what the Black Mesa team would put out. Dan was so happy with the product that he decided to do a full playthrough of the epic re-imagining of Half Life over on The Rob and Dan Show YouTube!

Make sure to watch every video (New video every Tues/Thurs!) over at our Black Mesa Playlist!
